rooms.description: Spacious entrance with built-in storage and Vastu-compliant entry.
Open plan living space combined with a dining area, facing the east as per Vastu guidelines for positivity.
Modern kitchen integrated into the living area. Designed for functional cooking and family interactions, ensuring proper ventilation from north-east as per Vastu norms.
Multi-purpose space that can be used as a study or additional living area for the joint family. Ideally placed in an east-west orientation to balance energy flows.

openings.description: Entry door positioned in the north-eastern corner of the ground floor, aligned with Vastu principles for wealth and prosperity.
Glass sliding doors leading from the living area to a small courtyard or garden space designed to enhance natural lighting.
